price: Mo sì sọ pé, ẹ tọrọ àforíjìn ní ọ̀dọ̀ Olúwa yín, dájúdájú Ó ń jẹ́ Aláforíjìn.
arabic: فَقُلۡتُ ٱسۡتَغۡفِرُواْ رَبَّكُمۡ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ غَفَّارٗا

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: faqul'tu is'taghfirū rabbakum innahu kāna ghaffāran
